alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Clarion; Indiana; Jefferson (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 9:14PM EDT until July 20 at 10:15PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Indiana County in west central Pennsylvania... Jefferson County in west central Pennsylvania... Central Armstrong County in west central Pennsylvania... Southeastern Clarion County in west central Pennsylvania... * Until 1015 PM EDT. * At 914 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Sandy to near Rimersburg, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... Punxsutawney, Brookville, Rimersburg, Reynoldsville, Brockway, New Bethlehem, Sykesville, Falls Creek, East Brady, Rural Valley, Sligo, Big Run, Dayton, Summerville, Limestone, Rossiter, Hawthorn, Ernest, Marion Center, and Creekside. This includes Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 79 and 96. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
